sequence: <size=45>Chapter 2 - What You Need Is A CPU!</size>

scripts.say: ...I see. So in short, you came here from another dimension, correct?
Yup, that's right! I'm Neptune, nice to meet you! Some people call me Nep-Nep, others call me Neppy, but you can call me whatever you want!
Okay then, let's go with Nep-Nep. It sounds cute.
Oooh, I see you're a woman of culture! Also, we came from this place called Gamindustri, and I'm the CPU of a country we call Planeptune!
A CPU...? You don't look like a machine to me, though... Do you have any proof of that?
You want proof? Fiiiiine, guess I'll just have to prove it. Just stay on the line while I... TRANSFOOOORM!
...Phew. Having no shares makes it really difficult to remain in this form.
Whoa! She actually transformed...!
Hold on, aren't you one of the enemies from the Mirror Sea we just fought?!
So we just fought... Nep-Nep?
No, let me explain. What you fought were imposters pretending to be us.

...No need to stay in CPU form now that I've proven myself! Anyway, we also fought those imposters earlier, but we don't have enough shares, so we couldn't use our powers like normal and we had to do the ole run for our lives act. Think you could help us out?
You're asking me like I'd even know how to help...

She's right. We won't get anywhere asking about something they know nothing about. We'll just confuse them... Oh, pardon, my name is Noire. I'm the CPU of Lastation. You'll have to excuse my pink-haired friend here.
We should introduce ourselves as well... I'm Z23. You don't need to be so formal with me.
I'm Javelin! Nice to meet you!
I'm Ayanami... It's a pleasure.
We're sorry for being such a nuisance... We only just arrived in this world and we don't even know which way's left or right...
No, no, not at all. I'm certain that you have been equally inconvenienced.
So you came from another dimension, huh... I see that all the time in anime, so I think I understand.
Ayanami, you do know anime is just fiction, right...?
Sounds like something you'd hear Neptune say...

Anyway... Could you tell me more about this world? We know that while there aren't many shares in this world, they do exist, so I think there has to be some kind of connection between this world and Gamindustri.
Those imposters of us that appeared, and the many mysteries surrounding Mirror Seas... Do you think they might have something to do with why we were sent to this world?
...If possible, we'd like to find that out as well.
For now, I sent a request to the commander regarding your housing and stay at the academy. I received his approval just a while ago so you should have nothing to worry about.
Wowzers! Does it include room service and 3 meals a day?! Tonight, we dine in heaven, Noire! Thanks a ton, Z23!
We're not gonna need any room service, you know... That aside, thank you, Z23. We both owe you for this.
Not at all, it was my pleasure. Incidentally, would you two happen to be hungry?
You can't fight on an empty stomach, as they say. We have some food if you'd like to eat.
Ah, thank you. I haven't had anything to eat ever since we came to this world. I could eat a horse, downloadable armor and all.
I thought you'd never ask! What's on the menu?
Oh my, aren't we all enjoying ourselves? Would you mind if I joined in on the fun?
Finally, there you are... If only you'd looked for us as much as we looked for you...
Nep-Nep?! Is that who I think it is...?
Vert? And Blanc? How in this world did you end up here?!
Are you both in good health?
I knew it, Vert and Blanc are here too! Let me guess: you guys had no idea where the academy was and you were floating around in the ocean up until now?
Our names don't start with "N" and end with "eptune" so no, that's not the case.
We were worried about you so we came out to meet you here.
Wow! A friend in need is a friend indeed! What you need is a CPU!
We're not here to rescue you guys or anything like that... Hey! Let go of me! I'm not a tissue for you to cry and blow your nose into!
So, is it just you two? What about Histoire?
Gamindustri is currently experiencing a CPU shortage, so she decided to stay behind.
Apparently she wanted us to go investigate this world then report back...
She told us to come here and thoroughly investigate the wormhole as well as what, if any, connection this world has to Gamindustri.
It looks like Noire and Neptune's got some company!
Now there are 4 of them, and 4 of us...
Ahahaha... I think things are going to get busy around here.
Yawn... You guys take over from here... I'm gonna rest... Zzzzz...
